metadata.title: CVE-2018-3737 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
sshpk is vulnerable to ReDoS when parsing crafted invalid public keys.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-3737` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-sshpk - 1.16.1+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-sshpk package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.16.1+dfsg-2').
